programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Roses and Stripes Wedding Cake, Scroll Motif Wedding Cake, Bobble Head Groom's Cake
programme.desc: The CakeGirls construct a "bobble head" groom's cake Reva designs a vivid cake with black-and-white stripes and apple-green fondant and the women in NY battle a heat wave, which threatens to wilt their fondant and melt their iced stencil designs.

programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Lavender, Quilted, Renaissance
programme.desc: The CakeGirls create a simple cake with a quilted design. Marc and Reva create a cake in the spirit of the Renaissance. Christopher Garren's creates a cake inspired by the bride's wedding invitation.

programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Stacked Teacups, Sci-fi Victorian and Koi
programme.desc: The CakeGirls create a topsy-turvy teacup cake for a bridal shower. Christopher Garren's Cakes creates a unique cake that is inspired by the Victorian age and sci-fi the LA bakery creates an underwater world in butter cream, including koi fish!

programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Pantry Shower, Edward Scissorhands, and Chandelier
programme.desc: The Chicago team creates a gravity-defying cake depicting the ingredients to a great marriage Christopher Garrens makes a cake based on the movie "Edward Scissorhands" the NYC bakery builds a chandelier-inspired cake, complete with lighting system.

programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Tiffany, Modern Cutouts and Pink Orchids Wedding Cakes
programme.desc: The Tiffany-inspired cake is black and white with blue accents, and creates tension in the OC bakery as Chris pushes for perfection. The CakeGirls tackle a modern cake with cutouts and the NY bakery adds stenciling to a white cake with orchids.

programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Pirate Ship Cake Diner Desserts Bridal Shower Cake Magnolia Cake
programme.desc: The LA team crafts a sea-worthy Pirate Ship cake, while Christopher Garren's bakery draws inspiration from a diner for a bridal shower cake. And Ben at the Chicago bakery challenges his artistic side working on a Magnolia-inspired wedding cake.

programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Wheel of Cheese Groom's Cake, A Picnic Wedding Cake, Calla Lilies Cake
programme.desc: The Chicago girls whip up a picnic cake with a roasted-pig topper the LA bakery makes a cheesecake that looks like (what else) a wheel of cheese and Christopher Garren's Cakes creates an elegant cake with inverted tiers and yellow calla lilies.

programme.title: The Locator: A Daughter's Dream & The Last Sister
programme.desc: Wendy tries to re-unite her estranged family, twenty years after their mother abandoned them. Nycole, who has reunited with three of her four siblings, remains desperate to find their youngest sister.

programme.title: The Locator: The Dad Who Didn't Know...
programme.desc: Twenty-five year old Chad has just returned from his second tour in Iraq, and is determined to meet his father, who has no idea that Chad was ever born.

programme.title: The Locator: A Daughter's Mission
programme.desc: Alexia's mother is not willing to share information about her biological father, so Alexia has enlisted Troy's help to track him down - behind her mother's back.

programme.title: The Locator: A Son's Search
programme.desc: Chris' mother committed suicide when he was only 3 years old. Now, years later, he and his wife enlist Troy's help in finding his biological father.

programme.title: The Locator: A Daughter's Promise
programme.desc: One week before his second birthday, Warren's father picked him up for a visit and never returned. Now, 28 years later, Warren's sister, Holly, is determined to reunite him with their mother, Carol. Will Troy succeed in reuniting this family?

programme.title: The Locator: A Brother Reaches Out
programme.desc: Scott was shocked to find out about Donald, the brother he had never met. Now, upset by his family's choice to reject Donald, Scott enlists Troy to help him reach out and bring his brother into his life.

programme.title: The Locator: A Father's Amends
programme.desc: Nicole's father is dying of lung cancer and she's determined to reunite him with her half-brother, Michael, whom she's never met.

programme.title: The Locator: A Dying Wish
programme.desc: Warren failed to honor his best friend's dying wish that he stay in her daughter's life after her passing. Now, Warren is determined to re-unite with her daughter and share the memories he has of her mother.

programme.title: The Locator: The Truth About Dad
programme.desc: Jeremy has been given many conflicting explanations for his father's estrangement, and is determined to meet and get to know the truth about his dad.

programme.title: The Locator: A Mother's Peace of Mind
programme.desc: As a child, Cindy was placed by her mother into a two-parent home. At 18, she put her own son up for adoption. Now, twenty-two years later, she enlists Troy's help to find out if she made the right decision.

programme.title: F.L.I.P. Mysteries: Women on the Case: Pilot
programme.desc: FLIP is a team of women who band together online to track clues and solve cases across the country.

programme.title: The Locator: A Brother's Story
programme.desc: Jerry and his sister have been searching for their half brother for almost 40 years. The two reached out to Troy because they and their ailing mother are desperate to reconnect with Michael after all this time.

programme.title: The Locator: Katie's Last Hope
programme.desc: Adopted as a baby, Katie has always wanted to meet her birth family. Troy gives Katie the surprise of her life when he finds her birth mother. Will this meeting help Katie get the answers she's been seeking?

programme.title: The Locator: Stolen Kisses
programme.desc: Angel was separated from her twin sons after her ex-husband moved away with the boys. Angel reached out to Troy, who located the twins. Will they be interested in reuniting with their biological mother?

programme.title: The Locator: Brother's Lost & Found
programme.desc: Ricardo grew up an only child but has an older brother who was given up for adoption. Now, Ricardo wants Troy to help him find his brother after years of unsuccessful searches.

programme.title: The Locator: A Wife's Gift
programme.desc: John's wife wants to surprise him on their wedding anniversary with a reunion with his younger sisters, who were separated from him over thirty years ago.

programme.title: The Locator: A Daughter's Tears
programme.desc: Jaclyn's father disowned her after she had a baby out of wedlock at 21. Jaclyn would like the chance to tell her father that she is getting her life together. Will Troy be able to locate him?

programme.title: The Locator: 25 Years Later
programme.desc: Annie and Nicole were partners in crime in high school, but were separated after a stint in juvenile detention. Annie is sober now and wants to reunite with Nicole to show her the kind of woman she's become.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Four" - Tensions arise in the kitchen during all-Italian night at the restaurant, with one team playing dirty to get ahead.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Five" - The players attempt to re-create Gordon's signature dishes for a discerning crowd at a Los Angeles eatery.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Six" - In the first half of this two-hour special, Chef Ramsay reveals the latest twist: each team will create its own menu consisting of three appetizers, entrees and desserts.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Seven " - In the final part of this two-hour special, the five remaining contestants learn that they're no longer competing as teams, but as individuals.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Eight" - The four remaining chefs are given fifteen minutes and a tray of leftovers to create a meal that Chef Ramsay considers servable.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Nine" - Chef Ramsay orders the three remaining contestants to serve an entire dining room. Who will create the best dish, and who will be sent home without their just desserts?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Ten" - In the season finale, the final two — with some help from the eliminated chefs — compete in a simulation that tests their abilities to run a restaurant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day One" - Twelve chefs begin their journeys for the final prize: an executive chef position at the newly opened Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Two" - After a disastrous opening night, both teams learn the hard way about the importance of restaurant service — by waiting on tables.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Three" - Frustrated after another lackluster dinner service, Chef Ramsay shares some of his experiences running a successful restaurant while setting the third night's competition.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Fine McCool's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits the family-run Finn McCool's in Westhampton, New York and faces an obnoxious head chef who happens to be the owner's son.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Lela's
programme.desc: Lela's is an upscale restaurant in desperate need of clientele. When Chef Ramsay starts criticizing the menu, the executive chef sees red, leading to a showdown in front of the staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Campania's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay heads to Fair Lawn, New Jersey to find a lackadaisical wait staff hurting the Italian restaurant Campania's.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: The Secret Garden is a romantic French restaurant that is on the brink of bankruptcy. Chef Ramsay causes a stir as he suggests changing the ugly décor, the menu and the filthy kitchen.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited: Gordon Returns
programme.desc: When Chef Ramsay returns to Finn McCool's, The Olde Stone Mill, The Mixing Bowl, Dillon's, Campania's and Peter's, he finds restaurants saved from the brink of disaster.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Handlebar
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Mount Sinai, New York to help spruce up Bill and Carolyn LeRoy's Handlebar restaurant and lounge, which looks like it's stuck in the 1980s.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Giuseppe's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay makes his way to Macomb Township, Michigan to inspect Giuseppe's, a family-run Italian restaurant afflicted with a bickering father-son duo and a shortage of customers.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Trobiano's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay tries to help Italian restaurant Trobiano's. When Ramsay confronts the owner about the cleanliness of the kitchen and the tastiness of the food, tensions rise.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Black Pearl
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Black Pearl, a seafood restaurant that has three owners, each running the kitchen in a different manner. This leads to a confused staff and variable quality in food.

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E181
programme.desc: Joining us on this week's I'm LIVE is guitarist and singer-songwriter Jukjae! This artist initially made his reputation in the music scene as a session guitarist, composer, and arranger. Then in April 2014, he released a self-written song "View" through the compilation album, "bright #2," and his debut album, "One Word," in November, officially starting a singing career of his own. Thanks to his dexterity in playing guitar, he has played with a number of top musicians, including Park Hyo-shin, Kim Dong-ryul, IU and more. Last month in November, Jukjae released his second mini-album, "2006," the year Jukjae describes as “the most beautiful and innocent time” in his life. With the lead single, "Shining, My 2006," he hopes people will look back at the time they were at their brightest and happiest, to escape reality for a brief moment. In this episode, Jukjae performs "Shining, My 2006," "The Door," "Do You Want To Walk With Me?" "Let's Go See the Stars," and "View." Tune in to "I'm LIVE" and take a glimpse into his artistry!

programme.desc: Concerned parents Brendan and Michelle start a band that makes kids music. The Portland Nerd Council issues a Public Service Announcement. Malcolm & Kris have an uncomfortable lunch at a vegan restaurant. The Feminist Bookstore hosts a comedy night.

programme.title: Portlandia: Off the Grid
programme.desc: Following an environmental scandal, The Mayor steps down from office and moves off the grid. A dolphin discovers that plastic bags have been banned in Portland. Musicians compete in a Battle of the Gentle Bands.

programme.title: Portlandia: The Temp
programme.desc: A temp worker hopes to turn her gig as Interim Mayor of Portland into a full-time job with Fred and Carrie's help. A wedding is interrupted. Local baristas draft a coffee shop manifesto. Kath and Dave struggle to find a table at a restaurant.

programme.title: Portlandia: Soft Opening
programme.desc: Peter and Nance practice hosting friends at the "Soft Opening" of their Bed and Breakfast. A magazine features a local furniture maker in their "Man Issue." Steampunks attend a convention. Fred takes a love interest on a bold third date.

programme.title: Portlandia: Alexandra
programme.desc: The City of Portland is overrun with art projects. Fred and Carrie's relationship is complicated by their roommate, Alexandra. A movie theater sells artisanal concessions. The consultants from "Japanese Toys, Cool Offices" get to work.

programme.title: Portlandia: No-Fo-O-Fo-Bridge
programme.desc: The Rats decide to move out of their newly gentrified neighborhood. First-time parents read various child-rearing books. Gahvin and his girlfriend go to the movies. Carrie and Alexandra have dinner at a communal table.

programme.title: Portlandia: Blackout
programme.desc: Electricity is shut off for the entire City of Portland due to unpaid bills at the Mayor's Office. Peter and Nance have a mysterious guest at their bed and breakfast. Kath and Dave go into survival mode.

programme.title: Portlandia: Sharing Finances
programme.desc: A young woman (Kirsten Dunst) is haunted by very informed ghosts. Doug and Claire make a big commitment to one another. Kath and Dave make the most of fifteen minutes. Sandra finally finds a soulmate. Fred is visited by a Date Fact Checker.

programme.title: Portlandia: Ecoterrorists
programme.desc: Ecoterrorists (including Olivia Wilde) protest animal testing at makeup company. Bryce and Lisa Rent it Out! Toni and Candace have a car wash. Fred misses hip hop.

programme.title: Portlandia: Celery
programme.desc: A celery salesman (Steve Buscemi) goes to great lengths to get celery back on the table. 911 dispatchers assure callers that it's beets. The Order Grill is open for lunch. Carrie declares social bankruptcy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Robert G. Lee - Laughter's Still Legal!
programme.desc: Proud smart aleck Robert G. Lee jokes about performing in a prison, Millennial baseball, and over-protective parents.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Johnny Beehner - The Flamingo Special
programme.desc: Johnny Beehner puts on a funny show. He's got everything you want from a comic: He's silly, he’s likeable, and he's fun. With a background in improvisational theater including training at Chicago’s prestigious Second City, as well as the Upright Citizens Brigade in Los Angeles, Johnny brings a unique style to the stage. Beehner made his network television debut in January of 2015 as one of the last comedians to appear on the Late Show with David Letterman. He has made numerous appearances on FOX "Laughs" television show, and regularly appears on the nationally syndicated Bob & Tom Show. His comedy can be heard regularly on XM/ Sirius Satellite radio. Other notable and accomplishments of Johnny's include winning First place in Comcast's 2014 season of "Trial By Laughter," placing third in the 2014 “Laughing Skull Comedy Festival” of Atlanta, and making it to the finals in the 2012 “Great American Comedy Festival”. He was named one of Ricky Gervais' Top 5 picks in the "Just Sayin” stand up contest. Johnny was recently named one of 2015's Top10, "Hot Comics to Watch" by his wife. She says that he would have a shot at the #1 spot if he would “work just a little bit harder”. He's a married man, a new dad, and his current life goal is to win just one argument with his beautiful wife.

programme.title: Matt Falk - Un-Lit
programme.desc: Matt Falk was called “effortlessly funny” by the CBC. He’s performed at Just For Laughs, The Hal!fax Comedy Festival and the Winnipeg Comedy Festival. He was recently named one of the “Best of the Fest” at the Burbank Comedy Festival in California.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jason Russell - Beige Frosty
programme.desc: Like most comedians, finding a way to be silly in class was a way to get attention from classmates and teachers! Some teachers were amused others had no sense of humor.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Lisa Mills - This is My Real Accent
programme.desc: Lisa Mills is an Atlanta based, award-winning comedian, speaker, and author. Her acting debut was working alongside network television’s favorite military gal, Catherine Bell on the Lifetime Channels hit show, Army Wives.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Rob Brackenridge - Legend Dairy
programme.desc: Wisconsin native Rob Brackenridge offers sharp observations of his hometown with riffs on accents, beef snacks, and black ice.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Fred Klett - One of Ten
programme.desc: Fred Klett has built a career from being a clean comedian, a style that is his trademark. His comedy is G-rated and focused to appeal to families with members of all ages since much of his material is taken from his experiences growing up in a large Christian family. As a mainstream performer, his brand of humor is rare and refreshing and is rooted in his faith in Christ and belief in the Holy Scriptures.

programme.title: Jamie Lissow - Something Awesome
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Jamie Lissow is best known for his role in the current Netflix Original Series Real Rob, alongside SNL alum Rob Schneider, a show Jamie co-wrote and co-produced. Jamie made his network television debut on The Tonight Show and has since appeared on The Late Late Show, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central’s Premium Blend, Gotham Live, Star Search, and his own half-hour Comedy Central special. A headliner at comedy clubs across the country, he’s also been featured at The Montreal Comedy Festival and The Great American Comedy Festival. Lissow has appeared on Fox News Redeye more than 50 times while still managing to have no political opinions.

programme.title: Mike Brody - Not Afraid of Butterflies
programme.desc: Starting comedy on a whim at an open mic in the year 2000, Mike Brody has since devoted his life to perfecting the delivery of his high-energy act. Bucking the trend of the apathetic comedian, his genuine passion for his craft draws audience members into the unique world of Mike Brody: an affable, clever guy whose life is often derailed by his own neurotic, obsessive-compulsive tendencies. Brody has worked with Jay Pharoah, Dave Attell, Patrice O'Neal, Emo Philips, Joy Behar, Doug Stanhope, Doug Benson, and legendary street performer/madman/savant Wesley Willis. He is the official event comedian for the SyFy Channel’s TV show Ghost Hunters and has also appeared on the nationally syndicated radio program The Bob & Tom Show as well as The Dan Patrick Show.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Steve Bruner - Simply Put
programme.desc: Steve Bruner looks like a perfectly normal guy—until he opens his mouth. He’s delivered his laser-sharp humor on Comedy Club Network (Showtime), An Evening at the Improv (A&E), Into the Night (ABC), and The Byron Allen Show (NBC), to name a few.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Christian Pieper - Glutton for Punishment
programme.desc: Christian Pieper is an award-winning and crowd-pleasing comedian from Beaver Dam, Kentucky, now living in Los Angeles. In just five years as a performer, Christian has quickly earned acclaim for his honest, smart, and welcoming approach to personal material, layering unexpectedly subversive observations on current events, culture, and relationships.A two-time semifinalist in the prestigious Boston Comedy Festival, hes also been featured in the Crossroads Comedy Festival, Burbank Comedy Festival, and other festivals and competitions across the country. Christian has also performed abroad, having done shows for troops and civilians in eight different countries, and was a guest on the Bob & Tom show. He currently hosts and produces Adrenaline, a comedy-challenge show presented regularly at Wiseguys Comedy Club in Salt Lake City and the Hollywood Improv.

programme.title: Bob Smiley - Tartar Terrorist
programme.desc: In-demand stand up comedian known for his machine gun approach and hilarious, clean material.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Rex Havens - Women & Children First
programme.desc: Rex has been delighting comedy audiences for 20 years, in world-famous comedy clubs like The Improv, Catch-A-Rising Star, Funny Bones and Zanies, on television for Showtime, Comedy Central and Comic Relief, on radio with Bob & Tom and NPR, cruise ships worldwide, and corporate clients including GM, American Express, Texaco, 3M, Coca-Cola, IBM, Toshiba, Lowe’s, Johnson & Johnson, Ameritech, Proctor & Gamble, State Farm, Quaker Oats, Verizon and the IRS (“Working for the IRS is the only sure way to get money from them.”), and numerous non-profit and charitable organizations, such as St. Jude’s and the Make-A-Wish Foundation. A former college professor who made the unusual transition to the standup comedy stage in the ’80’s, Rex has always believed that laughter is the best defense against a confusing and challenging world. Rex’s take on marriage and family has propelled him to performances in all 50 states and around the world, including London, Hong Kong, Amsterdam, Bermuda, Montreal, Barcelona, Copenhagen, Aruba, Rome and Cannes.

This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (former stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 aka MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Gammera The Invincible

programme.title: Dr Poppy to the Rescue
programme.desc: Come on down to Dr Poppy's Pet Rescue Centre and learn about the amazing animals who come to visit.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapo. Realizing how to correctly wield the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates evil replicas of the Ninja to face off with our heroes. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are invited back the Darkly's Boarding School, only to discover it's a trap and now the bad kids have seized control of the school. With the Ninja trapped in the school with the faculty, things spiral out of control as the Evil Replica Ninja arrive. As an awesome battle takes place in the school halls, the Ninja manage to outsmart their evil versions, and warn Lord Garmadon they're ready for whatever else he throws at them.

programme.title: Monster Chef - Episode 205
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his "Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition" cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. "Hot chili makes hot monsters!" Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands - meaning Jestro's - could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. "Nope, not hot enough...waaaay too much garlic....you call that hot?!" (BELCH!)

programme.title: Change Of Address - Episode 15
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong - especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing ("Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?"), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out - Episode 206
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests then...more training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort "Exalted Towers" renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the "high class" resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are "off" at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to see...Jestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters - though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In - Episode 16
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends - until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends - until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to 'turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster. Tired of intense training, Lloyd yearns to play and enjoy his youth. The Ninja remind Lloyd that along with great power, comes great responsibility. When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to 'turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and soon discover they've been turned into kids! Seeking Lloyd's help and relying on childhood antics, the five ninja kids must destroy the reawakened monster that's hunting them in the city. In the end, Lloyd makes the difficult decision and sacrifices his youth in order to save them from the beast, turning forward the clock and turning Lloyd into a young man. Sensei Wu fears now that since Lloyd is young man, the final battle of good versus evil approaches sooner than he had ever expected.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever - Episode 207
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of "snotty" monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham - one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a "snotheiser" ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters ... some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bath...he'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or two...it's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power "Glorious Griffon" but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: I Told You So - Episode 17
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her - till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit...

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight - Episode 208
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton - the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hear...laughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, "my monster is so fat" jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as "bouncers" to keep too many people out of the comedy club. ("Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.") The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. And...Jestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be bad...he is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages him...go on stage alone, be funny...he can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a "joke book" that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny - by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: "Where's my Jestro?!" Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest with...the Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: Snow Way - Episode 18
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all - the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Stone Army
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers. Lord Garmadon struggles controlling the Serpentine now that he is without the Mega-Weapon. His latest endeavor is to lead the snakes in search of a fabled Dark Island that ancient texts say holds dark powers. Unable to find the island, the furious Serpentine abandon Lord Garmadon out at sea. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are called to the museum to find the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has seeped into the ground beneath the city, and it's brought an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior to life! Our heroes come across Misako, Lloyd's long lost mother. She's an archeologist in search of stopping the prophesized battle between Lloyd and his father. She had unearthed the Stone Warrior, and shares how it was once part of an indestructible army created by a dark spirit named The Overlord. When the balance is altered and evil is let into Ninjago, it will allow the Overlord to return and bring darkness and destruction to the land. Unable to destroy the Terminator-like Stone Warrior, the Ninja cleverly trap it. In the end, Lord Garmadon awakens on a small island at sea and hears the voice of the banished Overlord, promising him his wildest dreams. Garmadon uses his four hands to activate a mechanism, raising a lost land from out of the sea, creating a Yin/Yang symbol with Ninjago. The ultimate battle between good and evil begins to unfold.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious - Episode 209
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal to...Clay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some 'Master Plan." Suddenly, they realize Monsters - led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster - are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lance...finally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the books...and now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayal...the Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towards...the Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Midwinter Night's Dream - A Robot Musical - Episode 19
programme.desc: When Emma accidentally causes Olivia to lose an important science prize, a furious Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends. But after a New Year's Eve dream, in which a living, breathing Zobo takes her on a tour of her past, present and potential future, Olivia is reminded that friendship is the most valuable prize of all. Today is the most important day of Olivia's life. Not because tonight is New Year's Eve, but it's also the day of the annual Robotics Challenge, when teen scientists compete to build the best robot and win a full university scholarship. Olivia has spent the whole year preparing her entry: an all-new, high-tech, flying Aviator Zobo. It's a sure winner - until Emma accidentally sabotages it and wins the trophy herself! Furious, Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends (for defending Emma), and stomps out in tears. That night, in a dream, a living, breathing Aviator Zobo takes her on a tour of her life - past, present and potential future - to remind her that friendship is the most valuable prize of all.

programme.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still
programme.desc: The ninja try to flee from the rest of the Stone Army that has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom - and things get a lot worse when Garmadon arrives with a 'Helmet of Darkness' and seizes control of the Stone Army. Scales finally takes leadership over the Serpentine and plans to burrow beneath Ninjago City to level it to the ground. But as they burrow, they run into a lost chamber holding the rest of the Stone Army. The Devourer's toxic venom in the ground brings the Stone Army to life, sealing the Serpentine in their tomb, and returning the snakes back to where they were first found. On the Dark Island, the Overlord directs Lord Garmadon to a giant celestial clock. Garmadon removes a 'Helmet of Darkness', which will grant the wearer control over the Stone Army, and also activate the clock to tick down to when the final battle will begin. Back in Ninjago City, the indestructible Stone Army surfaces and attacks, and the Ninja know the only thing they can do is to save as many people as they can. They manage to barely escape with other townspeople, only for the Destiny's Bounty's engines to get damaged. In the end, Lord Garmadon arrives with the helmet, and seizes control of the Stone Army.

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heroes - Episode 210
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters, having the final pieces of his evil plan in place, tries to take human form. Can the NEXO-Knights and Merlok 2.0 stop the greatest threat they've ever faced? Or will the kingdom be plunged into darkness...forever. The Redoubt of Ruination readies the final ceremony to call forth MONSTRUX, the arch-necromancer of the past. Clay, holding the Book of Betrayal walks to the gates of the spooky place. Inside, Clay hears strange...singing and music. It's like a twisted Broadway show of some kind. Meanwhile, the Knights all realize Clay is gone and so is the Book of Betrayal. Macy says Clay must be up to something. They have to trust him and, more importantly, they have to find him. At the Redoubt of Ruination the ceremony has already begun! The Book of Monsters wants the final ceremony that calls forth Monstrux to be like a really great show! The BOM then barfs up all the BOOKS OF EVIL into their places around Jestro. He's just missing the BOOK OF BETRAYAL, which Clay has. Clay says he'll trade the book for Jestro. The BOM immediately agrees to the deal and sets Jestro free. Then, Monsters grab-up Clay, restrain him, and put him in Jestro's place on the sacrifice stone. From outside, they're interrupted by the sounds of battle the Knights have arrived on the Fortrex and are attacking the Redoubt of Ruination. In the confusion, Jestro slips away. The BOM lets loose with a powerful protection spell to keep the Knights out as he starts with the ceremony...he's going to bring Monstrux out and remanifest him in Clay's body! Jestro is able to escape the Redoubt and make his way to the Knights, who can't seem to battle their way in. It's a race against time as the Knights try to get in and save Clay. As the Knights get in, they see that the crazy BOM is absorbing all the Books of Evil, one-by-one. He grows BIGGER and BIGGER! Macy calls for NEXO-Power...but it's not enough! The gigantic Book of Monsters sucks down the final book, the Book of Betrayal! He looms over Clay, about to consume him, too, and make him into Monstrux! Suddenly, Robin appears carrying TECHKALIBER...he tosses it to Clay. Just as the huge Book of Monsters falls on Clay, he holds up Techkaliber and Merlok 2.0 is there...his full power in the sword. Clay sticks the sword into the Book of Monster's huge mouth. BOOM! There's a BIG, MAGICAL EXPLOSION! As we cut back inside, we see the Book of Monsters is gone. The Knights release Clay and he thanks them and Jestro for saving him. Jestro thanks them all for saving him and seeing the good in him. WE DISSOLVE TO: The JoustDome. In a final ceremony the King and Queen reward the knights and congratulate them for keeping the kingdom safe. There are speeches, happiness and friendship. And Jestro even does a bit that's funny. At the very end we see a hint of something...Monstrux and the Book of Monsters are still out there.

programme.title: The Last Voyage
programme.desc: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a 'Temple of Light' that can restore the Ninjas' elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship. The Stone Army and Lord Garmadon have disappeared, and our heroes can see the mysterious Dark Island off their coastline. Fearing Garmadon is up to no good, Sensei Wu has the whole team suit up to begin a journey to the Dark Island. Since the Bounty's engines are damaged, they plan to go by sea. Misako reveals her ancient scrolls state of a 'Temple of Light' that could return the Ninja's elemental powers, and it could be found on the island. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon has the Army mining for more 'Dark Matter', using it to build a Super-Weapon that will recreate Ninjago in a twisted evil way. When a storm hits at sea, our heroes are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like starfish that can eat through a ship) and are forced to find refuge on a lighthouse at sea. Inside, Zane discovers his inventor father, the Tinkerer, is alive! Together, they repair the Bounty so it can fly again, escaping a giant Leviathan, and soaring to the Dark Island ahead.

programme.title: The Cloud - Episode 301
programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an "independent study" - he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles - which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together - and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: The Island Of Darkness
programme.desc: After battling off Garmadon's Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined. The Ninja camouflage the Bounty, creating a secret rebel base on the island. Misako says they must find the Temple of Light, because only when their elemental powers return, will they be strong enough to defeat the indestructible Stone Army. The Ninja search the dark, exotic island and come across Garmadon's compound, where they're building the Super-Weapon. The Ninja discover the Temple of Light is hidden at the highest peak of the island, and the Tinkerer aids their trek in creating a Drill Dozer so they can travel underground unnoticed. A final chase and battle takes place at the Temple of Light, as the Ninja solve the puzzle and harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd, who also becomes more powerful then he ever imagined. Their new abilities can destroy the indestructible Stone Warriors. Although Lord Garmadon finds this to be a setback, the Overlord reassures him darkness will prevail, as we end on seeing the Celestial Clock ticking down closer to zero.

programme.title: A Little Rusty - Episode 302
programme.desc: The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro unlocks a mysterious Forbidden Power. What kind ofhavoc will they unleash? And can Merlok 2.0 and the NEXO KNIGHTS make the new COMBO NEXO Powers work? The Knights finally make it to the Lava Lands - using their various new forms of transport, which are all strictly civilian vechicles - and they must regroup and learn to fight together again to face the new threat of Jestro, the Cloud of Monstrox, and their STONE MONSTERS (in this case, Stone Gargoyles.) But Jestro and his monsters beat back the knights and recover the STAFF OF MONSTROX - which was buried under the ceremonial chamber from Episode 210 (and is now the Lava Puker amusement park ride) - and they get away on Jestro's EVIL MOBILE, which he recovers from the HQ garage. Macy says this is exactly why she's been touring the kingdom preparing everyone for the next attack. The Knights have to get it together because now the entire kingdom is under threat...again. Robin decides he must upgrade the Knights' vehicles and make them more "fight optimized." Ava and Merlok 2.0 must figure out how to use new NEXO Powers because regular NEXO Powers do make Stone monsters back into stone, but the Cloud simply zaps them to life again. Meanwhile, in the IRON MOUNTAINS, Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find the first of the Forbidden Powers: RELENTLESS RUST. They find the ROGUL STATUE holding the power and zap him to life. Now...they can rust those shiny knights to pieces! Ava and Merlok are attempting to use NEXO COMBO POWERS - with hilarious results - as they try to figure out how they might work. When Jestro attacks, he's able to halt the Fortrex by instantly rusting its tracks and wheels! Robin has his hands full trying to clean all the rust from the attack of Relentless Rust. As the Knights attempt to defend against Jestro, the Cloud is zapping statues to life. He hits a statue with a bolt of lightning as Clay is touching it. Something happens...Clay feels odd stiff as if rock is mixing with his body. Finally, Ava and Merlok 2.0 download to the Knights their new thing: a COMBO NEXO COMBO Power. It works! It can smash the animated statues to dust! They use it to defeat Jestro, but he and the Cloud get away with the Forbidden Power of Relentless Rust. Victory ... sort of. Clay talks to Merlok 2.0...something has happened to him. What can they do? Merlok 2.0 is very concerned.

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's 'Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their 'captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.desc: ''Glacier National Park: Rocky Mountain High'' - Jack and Colton prepare for a possible encounter with grizzly bears as they head high into the Rockies.

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.desc: ''Glacier National Park: Bears, Big Horns and Glaciers'' - The guys have a run-in with a bear and a showdown with big horn sheep.

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.desc: ''Glacier National Park: Grizzly Bears and Rough Rapids'' - Jungle Jack Hanna joins the guys on a story-filled hike through bear country.

programme.title: Europe's Largest Desert
programme.desc:
Near the cold Pyrenees of Iberia, surrounded by ancient and dark green forests, there is an odd land where the rain is so scarce and the wind is always blowing. The soil is poor, there are no trees and the landscape has become very much like the moon. Is this what the future of desertification will look like?
This strange landscape is home to incredible creatures with surprising behaviours. We'll discover a place with a very dry skin but a wet hidden heart that allows even aquatic birds or amphibians to live. Living in such conditions is not easy and it's only the toughest animals that will survive.

programme.title: Epic Safari Destinations
programme.desc: "Changa Safari Camp" - Guided by Sean, Kristina explores the Matusadona National Park where they have incredible on-foot encounters with elephants and lions. Will she keep her cool as she comes face-to-face with one of Africa's apex predators? Kristina is treated to game-viewing by helicopter, tries her hand at fishing and witnesses lions stalking buffalo.

programme.title: Epic Safari Destinations
programme.desc: "Rhino Safari Camp" - Hosted by Rhino Safari Camp, the epic safari continues back in the Matusadona National Park where Kristina is guided by Steve. They explore the lakeshore, encounter the local hungry pride and Marula, the resident elephant, makes a lunchtime appearance.

programme.title: Epic Safari Destinations
programme.desc: "Nyanga & Thetford Estate" - The adventure continues as Kristina journeys to Far and Wide in mountainous Nyanga, Eastern Zimbabwe. Her guide Bernie begins the trip with some extreme adventure sports including braving the tallest zip line on the planet. She tackles obstacle courses, is taught wilderness survival skills and heads to a nearby reserve to photograph diverse animal species for her personal wildlife calendar. Kristina visits Thetford Estate where she's treated to amazing photographic opportunities for her personal calendar. Her guide, Craig Coid, gets her closer to white rhino than she ever imagined and takes her way back in time as he tells stories revealed by detailed rock paintings.

programme.title: Epic Safari Destinations
programme.desc: "Chilo Gorge Safari Lodge" - Kristina travels to Gonarezhou National Park in the South-East of Zimbabwe. Thomas, her guide, takes her to the breath-taking Chilojo cliffs, tracks an impressive buffalo herd and keeps his cool as they experience heart-stopping elephant charges. Will Kristina finally spot her dream leopard?

programme.title: Epic Safari Destinations
programme.desc: "Zam Expeditions & Kangya Pan Camp" - Kristina travels back to Mana Pools to experience the untamed wilderness in the extreme dry season. Her guide, Cloud, takes her on an expedition to find lion cubs and wild dog puppies. Richard guides Kristina into her closest encounter yet with a wild bull elephant. An evening excursion to Kanga Pan leads to breath-taking sightings of elusive creatures of the night.

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.desc: ''Katmai: Where the Bears Are'' - Jack and Colton get up close and personal with the massive brown bears of Katmai National Park in Alaska.

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.desc: ''Katmai: Journey to the Volcano'' - Jack and Colton trudge through miles of volcanic ash and forge a treacherous river.

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.desc: "Katmai: Return To The Valley of 10,000 Smokes" - Colton and Jack stop in Hot Springs National Park, Buffalo National River and Ouachita National Forest.

programme.title: Epic Safari Destinations
programme.desc: "Somalisa Expiditions Camp" - Upon arrival in Zimbabwe, Kristina Guberman travels to Hwange National Park - renowned for it's impressive elephant herds. She learns about these gentle giants, encounters cheetah on foot and chances upon a cheetah hunt with her guide, David.

programme.title: Epic Safari Destinations
programme.desc: "Sango Lodge" - Craig joins Kristina at Sango Lodge in the heart of the Save Valley Conservancy where they explore the vast, rugged wilderness. Kristina joins Bryce Clemence and his anti-poaching team as they demonstrate the effectiveness of the anti-poaching dog unit. Tracking notorious rhino on foot keeps their senses on high alert. Find out what causes the crew to hit the ground.

programme.title: Little Matters: Insects
programme.desc: Immerse yourself in the intricacies of the insect world. From the hunting traps of the ant lion to the ingenious technology termites use to keep their fungi farms cool. Insects represent over five million ways of being born, eating, communicating and building, finding mates and hunting: Little Matters journeys into their incredible and awe-inspiring world.

programme.title: Wildlife Savers
programme.desc:
Wildlife Savers is a documentary film about an extraordinary journey: 500 elephants will be moved to a new home in Malawi. This is one of the largest and most significant elephant translocations in human history. Due to poaching, habitat loss and human-wildlife conflict, elephants are being decimated across Africa. 'Wildlife Savers' however, is a different story - one of hope and restoration and of securing the future for Malawi's elephants.
Although Malawi has a relatively peaceful history, the country sees increasing conflict between wildlife and people. Heavily armed poachers are prevalent, harvesting illegal ivory from the remaining elephants, which have been reduced by half from 4,000 to around 2,000 in only twenty years. The "Wildlife Savers" of African Parks resist the onslaught, committing their lives to stemming the violence. What enables them to persevere in their determination to bring about change? Will this, one of the largest elephant relocations in human history, be the solution for elephants and humans in the region?

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we head back to South America to explore some of our favorite animals. We’ll start in Venezuela where the Orinoco River provides a home for people and animals – such as pumas, egrets, and crocodiles. We’ll also head to the Amazon Rain Forest where life is bursting at every turn. From red howler monkeys to harpy eagles, the Amazon Rain Forest provides us with some of the most fascinating animals on Earth.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us back to the Philippines where we will find some of the most fascinating wildlife in the animal kingdom. We’ll head to the mangrove forests where people still call home and use the rivers and streams as a means of transportation, food, and fun. We will also head to the trees where macaques play, and where tree nymphs turn into beautiful butterflies.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us to the peak of South America to the Andes Mountains. The tumultuous weather and treacherous heights have caused many unusual animals to form specialized behaviors in order to survive. We’ll explore what life is like for the descendants of the Incans, as well as the animals who call the Andes Mountains home.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer leads us to the heart of South America to explore the Amazon River Islands. Life on these islands benefit from the Amazon and Orinoco Rivers, as well as the rich rainforest that dominates the North East region of South America. From high flying squirrel monkeys to slow moving sloths, we will explore what makes the Amazon River Islands such a fascinating region of the Earth.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us to the coast of Africa to the archipelago of Zanzibar. We’ll explore the lush beaches and beautiful reefs that are full of exotic mammals, crustaceans, and fish. From the small fiddler crabs on Chumbe Island to the massive whale sharks just off the coast, we’ll discover what makes the wildlife in Zanzibar so fascinating.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we head to Southeast Asia where lies the island chain of the Philippines. We start on the Palawan Island where there is an array of interesting creatures. We meet a giant pitcher plant who gets its name from it’s large and oval shaped “mouth.” These plants are not alone on the floor, as scorpion’s and giant centipedes crawl around the forest floor. We then run into a Binturong, or commonly known as a bearcat. Despite its nickname, binturongs are not related to either cats or bears. After the forest floor, we go to the cold, damp caves that make up much of the Philippines landscape. In the caves we’ll find some creepy crawlers, like tarantulas and more scorpions. After the caves, we make our way down to the rivers where monitor lizards call home.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: On today’s episode of Earth Odyssey, we explore one of the biggest and most populated deserts in the world – the Thar Desert. There are many animals that call this Indian desert home, but it is also home to the thriving city of Jaipur. Over three million people live in this busy metropolis, but they share the streets and shops with macaque monkeys. But not all of them behave, and the trouble makers must be sent back into the wild. While we’re in the wild, we’ll go to a grassier part of the desert where deer, hogs, and peacocks graze. But they have to watch their back for one of the Thar Desert’s most dangerous predators – the tiger. We then head high above the trees where one of the most fascinating migrations in the animal kingdom flies. Cranes makes their way through the Thar desert and it’s a mesmerizing sight to see this natural behavior. Then we go full circle back to our troop of macaques as they face their biggest competition yet.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: On today’s episode of Earth Odyssey, we head to the Pantanal region of South America. The Pantanal is the biggest wetland on earth, but we begin with the animal that has more species and any other creature in the region: birds. Parakeets and parrots make their nest in the cliffs and trees, away from predators. But that doesn’t mean that they are totally safe. Predators hunt for prey all over the Pantanal, and predators even hunt for each other. We’ll see an epic showdown of power between a jaguar and a crocodile. We will then explore the circle of life that happens between the animals and locals in the beautiful South American region. From crocodiles to parrots, many different animals benefit from the relationship between the ranchers and their cattle. We then head back to the wetlands where crocs lay out in the sun next to storks, parakeets, and a variety of different birds.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: On today’s Earth Odyssey, we head to South America where the region of Patagonia hosts a variety of different animals. We start on the colder side of the region where penguins rule the land. There are millions of penguins here that almost out-number the number of humans that live in Patagonia. We then visit another animal who hangs out in the water, the beaver. Its dams are spread across the region and will often affect the lives and homes of the local birds. The wood pecker is among the birds affected by the amount of beaver dams. We’ll explore a day in the life of these wood peckers to get a better understanding of their habits. We then head to the glaciers and ice fields that host a wide range of creatures. From flamingos to guanacos to pumas, these ice fields have some of the most diverse wildlife in Patagonia. We will then meet the people who live there, and explore their relationship with wild, as well as tamed horses.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us on a journey to South America to the dense and crowded Amazon Rainforest. On this adventure, we will follow the sound of Red Howler Monkeys that leads us high up in the canopy. Then we march down to the forest floor to get a closer look at a colony of army ants. These aren’t the only small insects that we will see down below. We will also examine the relationship between wasps and tadpoles, as well as check out the daily activities of flies and stick ticks. After we are finished with the forest floor, we head back up to the trees where a harpy eagle is on the prowl for its next meal. This time, monkeys are on the menu, but are the monkeys quick enough to get away from this hungry harpy eagle? Plus, we head across the canopy to catch a glimpse of a slow-moving sloth.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us to one of the longest and largest rivers in the world: The Orinoco River. On this epic journey, we will explore the most exotic creatures living in the river, as well as the animals who depend on the river for food and shelter. This includes a puma who uses the river for water, as well as a hunting ground for its prey. We then meet the wild looking 4-eyed fish, as well the fiddler crabs who need to hide from the high-flying predator above. We then try to imagine what it would have been like to be the first explorers to make landfall, and the sights and sounds they would have heard. Plus, we climb the trees to hang out with some Red Howler Monkeys and get a first-hand experience of how they got their name.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: On today’s episode of Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dryer takes us on an adventure to Thailand where we meet an array of exotic creatures. We begin with exploring the vast fields where local hog deer graze. But it’s not always a safe meal for these deer, as they become the target for Indo Chinese Tigers. We then head to the forest and see some of the worlds most fascinating and oldest trees, which are home to all different types of monkeys. Gibbons and macaques’ live side by side in the canopy but have some unfriendly neighbors to deal with. We then head to the Isthmus of Kra where we’ll run into some incredible creatures who call the cave home.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: On today’s episode of Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us to Southeast Asia where the diverse country of Malaysia calls home. We start in the trees where we meet some of the most interesting, and interesting looking, monkeys in the animal kingdom. These proboscis monkeys will show us how they gather food while escaping predators. Speaking of predators, we will then go into the rivers for a closer look at crocodiles who are hunting for their next meal. We then head up to the highest peak of Malaysian mountains where we find all types of wildlife, including the pitcher plant. We then head to the home of the Malaysian orangutan and try to escape the grip of their biggest predators.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Dylan Dreyer takes viewers into the lives of the most powerful and elusive creatures on Earth.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Dylan Dreyer goes to the beautiful Galapagos Islands.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we head to Asia and visit the highest peaks in the world, the Himalayas. We’ll see everything from the migration of cranes to the daily life of snow leopards. The climate and landscape of these mountains are anything but convenient, so we’ll explore what it takes to call the Himalayas home.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we venture back to some of our favorite islands from around the world. We start in South America, home to the Amazon River Islands that are full of wildlife. From red howlers to squirrel monkeys, the trees on these islands are full of furry creatures. We’ll then head to South East Asia where the Philippines are full of unbelievable insects. We’ll even get a firsthand look at a tree nymph becoming a butterfly, but its new life gets off to a sticky start.

programme.title: Nessun Dorma
programme.desc: In this psychological neo-noir thriller, a woman experiencing cold feet about marrying her wealthy fiancé is kidnapped and tormented by a faceless captor.

programme.title: The Last Exorcism
programme.desc: A charismatic preacher expecting to perform a routine exorcism on a disturbed religious fanatic encounters a true evil beyond his wildest imaginings.

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: With a deadly virus spreading throughout the country, turning its victims into zombies, one man desperately tries to keep his infected daughter safe from the authorities who want to kill her.

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: Loan shark Chili Palmer (John Travolta) has done his time as a gangster. So when "business" takes him to L.A. to collect a debt from down-and-out filmmaker Harry Zimm (Gene Hackman), Chili jumps headfirst into the Hollywood scene: schmoozing a film star (Danny DeVito), romancing a B-movie actress (Rene Russo) and eating at the hottest restaurants in town. In fact, all would be cool for this smooth new producer if it weren't for the drug smugglers and an angry mobster who won't leave him alone!

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Dalton (Patrick Swayze) drives a Mercedes Benz, holds a degree in philosophy from NYU and makes lots of money. He's been shot at, stabbed and has broken most of the bones in his body. He also has a flip side - he's the best bar bouncer in the business. When Dalton's brought in to clean up a popular establishment that has become particularly rowdy, his calm is put to the test by the nasty local kingpin (Ben Gazzara) in this throwback to the great westerns of the 40s and 50s.

programme.title: The Last Exorcism
programme.desc: A charismatic preacher expecting to perform a routine exorcism on a disturbed religious fanatic encounters a true evil beyond his wildest imaginings.

programme.title: King Creole
programme.desc: Elvis Presley gives Bourbon Street a new beat in King Creole. He plays a troubled youth whose singing sets the French Quarter rockin’.

programme.title: Hatari!
programme.desc: Director Howard Hawks reteams with John Wayne, who heads a group of highly skilled professional game hunters in Africa. Only they don’t use bullets – they capture the ferocious big game with strong rope and cameras for zoos and circus attractions.

programme.title: The African Queen
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: Intense, enthralling, and unforgettable, Sunset Boulevard stars Gloria Swanson as Norma Desmond, a faded silent-movie star, and William Holden as Joe Gillis, a down-on-his-luck screenwriter whom she enlists to help her make her triumphant return.

programme.title: The Shell Seekers
programme.desc: A reclusive British matron of comfortable means suffers a near-fatal heart attack and decides it's time to get her life in order. Stars Angela Lansbury.

programme.title: Durango
programme.desc: A young man goes on a cattle drive in Ireland in 1939 and must deal with a scheming cattle baron and tries to win the heart of a girl. Stars Brenda Fricker. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: The Lost Valentine
programme.desc: Susan Allison, TV reporter, receives a sentimental news assignment: the story of Caroline Thomas, who has waited 60 years for her pilot husband declared missing in action during World War II, to return to her.

programme.title: The Russell Girl
programme.desc: Sarah Russell, the picture-perfect girl-next-door, took a job in Chicago thinking she could escape memories of a tragic accident that she blames herself for. But when she receives some unsettling news, Sarah returns home.

programme.title: Pictures of Hollis Woods
programme.desc: Having run away from a succession of foster homes, a 12-year-old girl resorts to desperate measures to stay with the eccentric retired teacher who's made her feel like she's finally in the place where she belongs.
