programme.desc: Cash strapped brothers must face the moral dilemma of being paid to "eliminate" a family business associate.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: After being unmasked during a heist, an infiltration expert finds herself mixed up in a conspiracy.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Nine criminals are placed on an island. Only the last person alive in 30 hours leaves the island.

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: In the revamped Condemned Tournament, convicts must fight to the death in a game broadcast to the public.

programme.title: Armed Response
programme.desc: A team of operatives are trapped inside a military compound and experience strange and horrific phenomena.

programme.title: The Good Catholic
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, small-town priest Daniel is torn between his commitment to his job and his newfound love, Jane. With Danny Glover.

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

programme.title: Don't Talk to Irene
programme.desc: After being suspended from school, Irene is sent to a retirement home as punishment in this quirky comedy.

programme.title: An Actor Prepares
programme.desc: After having a heart attack, an actor drives across the country with his estranged son on one last adventure.

programme.title: Ginger Snaps

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a plague of bizarre, puzzling murders grip London, young Holmes and his new found friend Watson find themselves unwittingly entangled in the dark mystery.

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Paris, an orphan who lives in the walls of a train station is wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker
programme.desc: After his uncle dies, a young boy learns of his relative's true occupation as an undercover spy and is later recruited to be undercover himself. Based on the novel by Anthony Horowitz.

programme.title: The Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course
programme.desc: The Crocodile Hunter (Steve Irwin) is trying to save a feisty croc from poachers. What he doesn't know is that the crocodile has swallowed a top secret U.S. satellite beacon, and the poachers are actually American special agents sent to retrieve it.

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.title: Earthstorm
programme.desc: After a massive asteroid crashes into the moon, it's discovered that the moon's structure is now entirely unstable, threatening all life on Earth.

programme.title: No Way Back
programme.desc: A rogue FBI agent (Oscar winner Russell Crowe) recruits a Yakuza boss and a ditzy flight attendant to help him rescue his kidnapped son from the clutches of a revenge-crazed mobster.

programme.title: Johnny Was
programme.desc: "Johnny Was" follows former Irish thug Johnny Doyle as he navigates questions of race and morality in an attempt to avoid all-out war with West Indian Yardies in a Brixton safehouse.

programme.title: Blunt Force Trauma

programme.title: Faces in the Crowd

programme.title: Kingdom Men

Little did he know that he’s in for the fight of his life. He realizes God didn’t call him to increase the men at the church but help them.

programme.title: Stolen Lilies
programme.desc: Sandra Dennis, a social worker, whose daughter was a victim of human trafficking must race against the clock to find four girls trapped in a warehouse before they are shipped out of the country.

programme.title: Captured

She has no idea about the secrets behind the camera left behind. It's only a matter of time before she begins to hear and see visions only behind the camera or whenever the camera is near. Is it real? or is she hallucinating?

programme.title: Invisible Lies
programme.desc: A Black lawyer must come to grip with his prejudices after falling in love with a White woman while simultaneously defending a Black teenager who has been wrongfully accused of drugging and raping his White girlfriend.

programme.title: The Lying Truth
programme.desc: A rapper is accused of assault by a beautiful video vixen. He says it was consensual. One of them will be exposed as a liar when the truth is revealed.

programme.title: The Good Life

Forced to choose between family and the good life, what will Mikey choose?

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan, Patrick Stewart, Gabrielle Anwar, Omar Gooding, Jason Durr, Danielle Calvert, Roy Marsden Escaping from a Confederate prison camp by balloon, five survivors land on an uncharted island in the Pacific. Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.

programme.title: Riot

programme.title: Pandemic, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Tiffani Thiessen, French Stewart, Faye Dunaway, Eric Roberts, Vincent Spano, Bob Gunton, Michael Massee When inexplicable flu-like symptoms kill a young man aboard an airliner en route to Los Angeles from Australia, Dr. Kayla Martin, head of the Center for Disease Control, orders the quarantine of all the passengers. But the deadly strain of this unknown virus is already spreading, and so is the panic. And now it’s a race against the clock, and across the globe, to find a cure.
